content.text: Nosgarl is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

Nosgarl is an aged man with light hair resembling horns, glasses, and a hooked nose. He wears an old-fashioned pirate dress, with a mantle and heels. As many characters, his legs are disproportionately short and slender compared to his main body.
Not much is known about Nosgarl's personality other than that he is very loyal to Whitebeard as he was willing to risk his own life trying to save Ace from execution.
Nosgarl is a fearsome pirate who has managed to achieve an infamous reputation in the New World, and he made an alliance with Whitebeard.
Some time prior to the current storyline, Nosgarl became a known pirate in the New World, and allied himself with Whitebeard.
When Portgas D. Ace was to be executed at Marineford, Nosgarl and his crew joined forces with the Whitebeard Pirates to save him.
He, along with the rest of the crew, attended Whitebeard and Ace's funeral on an undisclosed island somewhere in the New World.

elements.text: Whitebeard Pirates and their allies vs. the Marines and Shichibukai
↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 57 Chapter 558, Nosgarl makes his debut.
↑  One Piece Green: Secret Pieces, Nosgarl's name is revealed.
↑  One Piece Green: Secret Pieces, Nosgarl's concept art.
